solution_line_template: First find the number of pieces left after Anne sweeps up: {total_pieces} pieces / {swept_up_divisor} = <<{total_pieces}/{swept_up_divisor}={pieces_after_sweep}>>{pieces_after_sweep} pieces
Then subtract the number her cat takes: {pieces_after_sweep} pieces - {cat_stolen_pieces} pieces = <<{pieces_after_sweep}-{cat_stolen_pieces}={pieces_after_cat}>>{pieces_after_cat} pieces

Divide that number by {boyfriend_fraction_denominator} to find how many pieces her boyfriend picks up: {pieces_after_cat} pieces / {boyfriend_fraction_denominator} = <<{pieces_after_cat}/{boyfriend_fraction_denominator}={boyfriend_picked_up_pieces}>>{boyfriend_picked_up_pieces} pieces
